channel.title: Server problem please help
channel.description:
Whenever I log into my client I log in fine.. But whenever I try to get someone to log into my server on a web-client they log in and get logged right back out... I had tested this on 3 people, and know it wasn't a joke... I saw their name register in CMD, and I even saw their character in-game.. Anyway of fixing this?
The client and source link downloaded is here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,372081.0.html

item.title: Server problem please help
item.dc:creator: @BentonScape BentonScape
item.description:
@BentonScape wrote:

There Is Various Different Ways This May Have Been Caused, I Suggest That It May Be To Do With Not Enough Web Space / BandWith Or It May Be The Connection Bridge From Your Internet And Theres.

Read full topic
